title: Voices
description: Sometimes the ghosts from your past…are real.	Moira claims to hear voices and is sent a psychiatric hospital. Her doctor is hesitant to treat her as schizophrenic, as she doesn't show typical symptoms. As their sessions progress, she confesses there are two voices—and they aren't voices in her head, but the voices of ghosts.And one is determined to drag her into the afterlife with him.
author: Clarissa Johal
